description: Bans a user from the server.
noMember: ⛔ Member not found. Please try again with a valid member.
noPermission: Y⛔ ou do not have permission to ban this member.
noReason: ⛔ Please provide a reason for this ban.
incorrectTime: ⛔ The number of days of messages to delete, must be between 0 and 7, inclusive.
success: ✅ You have banned {{member}} from the server.
error: ⛔ An error occurred while banning {{member}} from the server. Please try again.
